title: mandhara dharanu
sahitya:
mandhara dharanu gOvinda mandhara dhara gOvindanu kALindiyali nalidADuta banda


caraNam 1    kastUri tilaka nosalali eseya mottada kovaLroDane koLalU dutta tutturu tururenuta
    caraNam 2    kombu koLalu bennali balu mereya rambheyaru sambhramadinda nODe kombina svaradali Adutta pADutta
    caraNam 3    suraru kinnaru kimpuruSaremballi sura puSpangaLa maLeyanu suriya guru purandara viTTalanADidanante
